message: Since this morning, Hezbollah has accepted responsibility for 6 attacks on Israel, including two attacks on Kiryat Shmona, Kfar Saled and Metula - in response to last night's attack on the Janta building in southern Lebanon by the IDF, an attack in which two Lebanese women were killed and several other Lebanese were injured.
event_breakdown:
IDF attacked the Janta building in southern Lebanon, killing two Lebanese women
Since that time, Hezbollah has accepted responsibility for six attacks on Israel.

message:
Palestinian sources report that the two whom the IDF killed yesterday in a house in Kabatieh 👆 were commanders in the Jenin Battalion of the Islamic Jihad. Their names:
Muhammad el Asti
Muhammad Shalabi - Abu Jaber

Later, another Palestinian was killed in Jenin by IDF fire. He was the son of an officer in the PA's security apparatus.
location: Jenin is a city in the north of West Bank.
event_breakdown:
Security-related Events as Reported in the Text:

* Two Palestinian Islamic Jihad commanders, Muhammad el Asti and Muhammad Shalabi - Abu Jaber, were killed in an Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) operation in Kabatieh, Jenin on May 12th, 2022.
* Another Palestinian, the son of an officer in the Palestinian

message: Lebanese channels report that one person was killed and ten wounded in an attack by IDF warplanes on a 3-story building in the village of Janta in southern Lebanon (Tyre district) last night.

Today, Fatah supporters mark the 17th anniversary of the "black coup" in Gaza, in which Hamas operatives brutally murdered hundreds of Fatah members, including members of the military and civilians.
Fatah operatives were thrown from the roofs of government buildings in Gaza handcuffed and blindfolded or shot to death at close range. This is how Hamas seized control of the government in Gaza.
Some will find commonality between the scenes from this day when Hamas operatives went on a killing spree in the streets of Gaza and between the killing sprees carried out by Hamas operatives on October 7 in Israel.
event_breakdown: Hamas operatives went on a killing spree in the streets of Gaza on June 10, 2007, killing hundreds of Fatah members and civilians, and taking control of the government in Gaza.

message: Gazans report a limited supply in the cattle and sheep market in Deir al-Balah in the center of the Gaza Strip ahead of the Feast of Sacrifice that will take place on Sunday.
event_breakdown:
Gazans report a limited supply in the cattle and sheep market in Deir al-Balah in the center of the Gaza Strip ahead of the Feast of Sacrifice that will take place on Sunday.
As of now, there have been no events related to security reported in the last couple of days that can be placed on a map.

message: The Lebanese are reporting a large fire in southern Lebanon as a result of an IDF attack earlier today.
event_breakdown:
IDF attack in southern Lebanon causes large fire
IDF attack in Lebanon causes large fire
